content: At least I know there will be fights over my “estate” at MY funeral, because all I’ll likely have is a whole lot of junk! It makes me wonder who will show up. I’m not going to give a whole lot of brain space to it, though. After all, I won’t be there, not really. The best I can hope to do is not to leave too big a mess for others to clean up. But that’s enough talk about human recycling. ;=) ‘Night y’all!
